agosthu masa 23 wana dina iru dina rathri 06 pasuwi winadi 49 ta dakunu dishabhimukhawa perahara pitathwa dalada widiya (wod widiya) ee.el.senanayaka widiya (kotugodalla widiya) osse rajawidiyen ihalatawith gewadima agosthu masa 24 wana dina sandu dina rathri 07 pasuwi winadi 12 ta dakunu dishabhimukhawa perahara pitathwa dalada widiya (wodiwidiya) yatinuwara widiya osse rajawidiyen ihalatawith gewadima 2015 agosthu masa 25 wani kuja dina rathri 07 pasuwi winadi 18 ta dakunu dishabhimukhawa siwdewalayanhi randoli baha edina sawasa 07 pasuwi winadi 25 ta sirith paridi dakunu dishabhimukhawa randoli perahara pitathwa shi්ra danthadhathu mandiraya idiripitata pamina pasuwa rathri 07 pasuwi winadi 42 ta dakunu dishabhimukhawa shi්ra dalada maligawe perahara samanga dalada widiya (wodwidiya) di.es.senanayaka widiya (thrikunamala widiya) pansala pare ihalata pamina dewawidiya kolambaa widiya (shi්ramath benatsoyisa widiya) ee.el. senanayaka widiya (kotugodalla widiya) haras widiya, di.es.senanayaka widiya (thrikunamala widiya) rajawidiya osse ihalatawith gewadima .

mehidi labha nolabima nisa kisiwakuta wasiyak nosalase.

megawot 200 ka widuli pramanayak jananaya karana palamu adiyare idikirim masa 10 kadi nima kerunu athara, balagaraye dewani adiyara 2010 pebarawariyedi sampurna kerini. 2008 desambar 8 wana dina pawathi balagarayehi palamu adiyara wiwrutha kirime awasthawata janapathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathada ekwu bawa pawaseyi.

me anuwa sapthambar 11 wanida mahinda rajapaksha mahatha indiyawe nawadilli nuwaradi ‘thrasthawadaya parajaya kirimen pasu shri lankawa yali godananwima’ pilibanda wishesha deshanaya pawathwimata niyamithaya.
obata hiti hatiye sarwagnyatha gnyanaya pahala wuwa se katha kiyawa kiyawa yayi. 2008 di loka winasaya gana gon kathawak kiwa se dan rahathun naha yanuwen sthirawama pawasayi.
samaharu kiwwa thamayi umbaata top ekata liyanna puluwanne kiyala.

nagenahira yuropaye saha sowiyat sangamaye stalinwadi thanthrawala binda wisirawima, samajawadaya maththehi dhanawadaye wijayagrahanaya lesa, palaka prabhun saha owunge madhya pracharakayan ha shasthralika kshamalapakayan wisin wishwiya parimanayen sadarayen pili ganu labuni. 1990 gananwala wijayagrahanawadaya padaka wune boru dekak mathaya: enam, stalinwadi thanthra samajawadi ya yanna saha dhanawadaye prathiwirodhatha kohoma namuth jayaganu laba atha yannayi.
